name: Sands of Liberty
description:
The beings from outer space have come and they are not looking for peace. You have just joined the taskforce as a commander to fight them back. Recruit new soldiers and send your best ones to battle to protect earth.

Game made together with Leonovsky for 7DFPS and PROCJAM 2020. Made with FTE QuakeWorld engine.

IMPORTANT: Noticed there's a bug in the released version, when you have a soldier die and the game asks you to pick another one, make sure you actually select a soldier. If you accidentally click deploy without selecting a soldier, the game will go into a weird state and you won't be able to refill your primary weapon ammunition.

How to play:

- Check SETTINGS menu in-game for controls.

- Start a new game.

- Hire new soldiers in "Team Management" view if you have the credits.

- Go to briefing, select the soldier you want to play as, and deploy.

- Complete the objectives and stay alive. Once a soldier dies they're gone for good. You lose the game if all your soldiers are dead.
